statements: SELECT * FROM research_data
SELECT title, researcher FROM research_data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, title, researcher FROM research_data WHERE researcher='John Smith'

SELECT * FROM research_data;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT collaborator_name, institution_name FROM collaborators WHERE role = 'Lead Researcher';

SELECT collaborator_name, institution_name, research_topic FROM collaborators c JOIN research_data rd ON c.research_data_id = rd.id;

SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE researcher_name LIKE '%Smith%' OR publication_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT name, role, contact_email FROM stakeholders WHERE role = 'Manager' OR role = 'Director';

SELECT name, email FROM stakeholders WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM research_project WHERE start_date > '2020-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
